content: I'm loving the indie-pop vibe! I actually discovered Pale Waves through a Spotify playlist, and I've been listening to their album "My Mind Makes Noises" non-stop. I'm obsessed with their song "There's a Honey" - the guitar riffs and Heather's vocals are just amazing. I've also been listening to some other new artists, like The Japanese House and MUNA. Have you heard of them?
